name: The Tale of the Brave Knight
name_original: The Tale of the Brave Knight
description:
Enjoy our story of a little brave knight.

You get to tell the story, what he does, or doesn't. Can you slay the red dragon? Controls are mouse only, select the option you want to try, and look what the results bring.

For the full experience, play on full screen.

Our submission for the minijam 63: theme - future and limitation a color palette.

(WebGL version might not work due to unknown error)
